additional_buffs.description: Increases the attack power increased by Fast Shoes in Guild Invasion. 5% increase for 5-star, and 10% increase for 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and can be increased up to 100%.
additional_buffs.name: Fast Shoes (Guild Invasion)

buffs.description: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Sindbad is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
buffs.name: Innervate 3

buffs.description: Increases the attack, defense and HP of elf units in Guild Invasion even if Barbarian is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 40%).
buffs.name: Battle Cry (Orc)

buffs.description: Increases cold resistance to 75 for each Barbarian, and 150 for each Senior Barbarian. Also increases max cold resistance through Barbarian from 2,000 to 4,000.
buffs.name: Cold Resistance

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 9%, and its attack speed by 10%.
Increases the movement speed of all units by 7%, and the critical damage by 9%
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Battle Cry (Orc) Limit Break: Effect of Battle Cry (Orc) increased from 30% to 40%.
Cold resistance based on Barbarian is increased by 50%. (5-star 50=>75, 6-star 100=>150) Additionally, cold resistance based on Barbarian can be increased up to 4,000.

[Fast Shoes (Guild Invasion)]: Increases the attack power increased by Fast Shoes in Guild Invasion. 5% increase for 5-star, and 10% increase for 6-star. Effects are applied even when in Time Shop and can be increased up to 100%.
description.skill1: Permanently increases  the beginning stage after being revived (20f, 40f, 60f, 80f, 100f)
description.skill2: Critical chance and critical damage of orc units increase in Guild Invasion (0%, 0%, 6%, 8%, 10%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Barbarian ]
